page.title: 14My Pets
page.content: My dog is a German Pointer. When dad goes shooting he goes barmy. At night he sleeps downstairs in the kitchen but when he was a puppy he slept in a cage and used to howl. He eats dog biscuits mixed with meat My dad made a fishpond out of a old swimming pool.We bought five goldfish which grew and had babies, and then dad got two golden orfs from a garden centre. My mum feeds them on fish food from a tub.When winter comes dad puts a old door and netting on the fishpond.The netting is for the fish to breath.The door is to stop the water turning into ice and killing the fish. The most important thing when you go near the pond is not to jump around and cause too many vibrations.
